ComicInfo.Summary:
Mal, Jayne, and River have infiltrated an Alliance facility that is home to more victims just like River—except, unlike her, they were never rescued. Now that Mal and the crew are in, the problem has become getting out—because Zoe still needs to be rescued and the Alliance is out for blood!
Zack Whedon returns to Serenity!
The story finally continues after the film!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dan Dos Santos | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Georges Jeanty | 2 |
